Posts.Content: Hi Lizzy, I was searching through the internet for answers to the same problem you had with your hair still falling out 4 weeks post FEC chemo. I am now 5 weeks post chemo, I used the cold cap and had 4 rounds of FEC. My hair is still falling out and I just wondered how you got on in the end. When it stopped shedding and started re-growing.  Did you use any supplements to help. I feel really down about it now and just want it to stop. Any help or advice you can give would be really appreciated. Thank you x
Posts.Title: Hair still falling out 4 weeks after chemo

Posts.Content: Being on line like  this new to me how long before  a reply ??anyone out there?
Posts.Title: Hi would love someone to chat to I'm very lost and upset right now...

Posts.Content: hi i just wanted to say thankyou nto all who replied and i would like to chat with lady whos children gone to university like mine but i am having difficulty figuring how it works with messaes and responding on here???
Posts.Title: would like to chat with woman who said kids gone to uni
